detail_desc: Set with two velour bracelets with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details. Size 3x20 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend in a wide, relaxed fit with a wrapover V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool and mohair blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length pull-on trousers in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

A-line dress in an airy organic cotton weave with gathered yoke at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves with embroidery and a small pompom trim. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber soles.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, and a gently rounded hem.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Seamless.
Hat in braided paper straw with a wide grosgrain band. Width of brim 7 cm.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a modal and silk blend. High waist with wide, covered elastication and extra-long legs with openings for the heels.
Short-sleeved playsuit in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the front, chest pockets and side pockets. Short, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims. V-neck opening at the top, a round neckline with twisted ties and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in spotted mesh with elastication and a wide, embroidered flounce at the top that continues over the arms. Lined.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a button placket, chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge ribbing around the neckline and ribbed cuffs.

Sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with a round neck with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounced wrapover hem. Unlined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a taped zip down the front and a mesh-lined, drawstring hood with a small peak. Side pockets with a taped zip, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Long, straight-cut kaftan in an airy weave with billowing flounces at the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. V-shaped opening at the top and a drawstring with narrow ties at the neckline.
Tube scarf in soft, garter-stitched cotton with ribbed trims at the ends and a small imitation leather appliqué.

Calf-length shirt dress in soft imitation leather with a collar, covered press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Short sleeves, a chest pocket, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an open section with a tie detail at the back. Seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined at the top.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a sheen. Spaghetti shoulder straps, a draped V-neck and a drawstring at the sides.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and discreet pockets in the side seams. Small, ribbed stand-up collar with a glittery edge, and the same ribbing with a glittery edge at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight, relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Trainers with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Wide, ribbed cold shoulder top in a soft viscose blend with short raglan sleeves.
Ankle-length pull-on trousers in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.

Padded ski mittens in functional fabric with embossed rubber on the palms, and an adjustable hook and loop tab and elastication at the cuffs. Reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.

Dress in tulle with a sequined bodice, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers at the hems, and a concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared, voluminous skirt in three layers of tulle. Lined.
Shorts in jacquard-weave cotton with adjustable tabs at the sides and a zip fly with a concealed hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a racer back.
Sandals with covered heels, a twisted detail at the front, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and heel caps. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere. Short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Belt in imitation suede with a heart-shaped metal buckle decorated with sparkly stones. Width 3 cm.
Metal clips with hair extensions in various shades that clip easily into your hair. Length of clips 2.8 cm. Length of hair extensions approx. 35 cm.
Metal hair clips decorated with a fabric butterfly.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Leather gloves with the tops of the thumb and index finger in touchscreen-compatible material. Lined.
Imitation suede ballet pumps with one open side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.
Handmade elastic bracelets with wooden beads.

Set in soft, organic cotton. Bodysuit in jersey with short puff sleeves, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch. Dungaree dress in sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps and a kangaroo pocket.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length, cuffed puff sleeves. Seam with double-layered trim at the waist. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a reflective print. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Cotton jersey shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims at the hem and sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side and back pockets and raw-edge hems.

Dress in cotton jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves in glittery tulle with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Seam at the waist and a lined skirt in three layers of sturdy tulle that has a flatlock seam at one side.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening at the top.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, printed jersey. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and short ties at the front, and short legs.
